review: Let me first start off by saying I have never given a bad review for any product,  but Amazon did such a bad job that this is the first. Also let me state that we have four Roku boxes in the house.  And I am an Amazon prime member, so I figured I should give it a go. First insulation was very easy!  I also work on computers and networks for a living so, getting it connected to the network was also easy. Here's where the issue started,  after about a day or two I noticed a slight pause every 30 seconds to every minute or so.  Making it slightly annoying to watch!  And trust me Internet speed is not an issue! I  try troubleshooting it,  reset up the network, try to different router,  all of which I knew were not the issue but I figured I'd try anyways .  Then I reset the device,  losing all my apps and started from scratch again. Finally I called Amazon saying I want to return it,  because they force you to call a number in order to return the fire stick!  Have to say I was pretty upset .  Then I talked to the lady on the  support line.  She said I had to reset it and try that.  She promised that would fix the issue even though I told her and already done It! I reset the fire stick and it got a little bit better for about two days again,  and it went right back to the same thing (  pausing and skipping constantly ) At that point rather than call Hotline again I just threw it aside went back to my roku,  and I have a watching problem for you ever sense.

review: This was replacement for one the Amazon Tech said needed to be exchanged.  But turned out it did the same thing as the other, would not connect even though settings menu said I had good signal, and also that all my other wifi systems were working well.  .  It was my router that was the problem, was not powerful enough for the Amazon stick.  Now works great with upgraded router.  Difficult for me to keep up with technology, stuff becomes obsolete in year or two, my previous router was only two years old.

It's a good thing I get free shipping on most of my orders as long as it is Prime!
